dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: What brings you to this land?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: I've been searching for a worthy adventurer to help me with a quest. Will you listen and see if you can help me?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: What is the nature of this quest?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: A dark sorcerer has stolen a powerful artifact from our village, and we need someone to retrieve it.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Why can't you or your people get it back?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: The sorcerer has set up powerful traps and minions in his lair. We've tried to send our own, but none have returned.
